      • fromBase64

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory fromBase64​(java.lang.String data)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        A method to get an Inventory from an encoded, Base64, string. Special thanks to Comphenix in the Bukkit forums or also known as aadnk on GitHub. Original Source
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Inventory created from the Base64 string.
